This is an utterly unacceptable situation, caused solely by the selfishness of a handful of individuals. It is wrong and immediate measures need to be taken to combat this. We cannot neglect the needs of both people and the environment for the profit of a few.

The needs of people and the environment should not be ignored for the profit of a few.
